name: Hangry Frogs - On Ice
description:
As soon as winter dawns, the fierce fight for the last food begins. In this local multiplayer two hungry frogs duel each other for the last, already frozen, fly on the icy lake. The frog can be rotated by the joystick. To interact with the world, its tongue can be stuck out with a button press.

Controls

Controller:

Keyboard:

     Player 1: WASD + Space

     Player 2: IJKL + Enter

Creators

Lenz Kleiser  - Concept, Coding, SFX, Music, Soundeffects.

To-Thanh Le - Concept, Story, Animations, Illustrations.
